headline: PNC Q1 Deep Dive: Loan Growth and Margin Resilience Amid Economic Uncertainty
summary: Financial services giant PNC (NYSE:PNC) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 6% year on year to $5.45 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $3.51 per share was 3.7% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
